trans-unit.source: Provides extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialization services for an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Fornece serviços de serialização de linguagem XAML para uma <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> no tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer> provides methods that serialize activity class objects into XAML format and deserialize XAML content into activity class objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer> fornece métodos que serializar objetos da classe de atividade em formato XAML e desserializar o conteúdo XAML em objetos da classe de atividade.

trans-unit.source: These services are primarily used by activity designers to persist the classes on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Esses serviços são usados principalmente por designers de atividade para manter as classes na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: For more information about serialization, see [Serialization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d1111c0-9447-4231-a997-96a2b74b3453).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre serialização, consulte [serialização](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d1111c0-9447-4231-a997-96a2b74b3453).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" /> to use in this instance creation.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" /> a ser usado na criação desta instância.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> a ser criado.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância do <see cref="T:System.Type" /> especificado usando o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the newly created <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência ao <see cref="T:System.Object" /> recém-criado.

trans-unit.source: The index of the last character in the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: O índice do último caractere na definição da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The index of the last line in the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: O índice da última linha na definição da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" /> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" /> que gerencia o processo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that was serialized.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que foi serializado.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer" /> that an object has just been serialized.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer" /> que um objeto acaba de ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> method runs and performs post-serialization processing on `obj`, primarily formatting and indenting code and extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) in the .xoml file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A> é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> método é executado e realiza o processamento de pós-serialização em `obj`, principalmente Formatar e recuar código e XAML extensible Application Markup Language () no arquivo. xoml.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" /> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" /> que gerencia o processo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> a ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer" /> that an object is about to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer" /> que um objeto está prestes a ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A> is called immediately before the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> method runs on the activity specified by `obj`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A> é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> o método é executado sobre a atividade especificada pelo `obj`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnBeforeSerialize%2A> writes the opening extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) tag for the activity, including any required attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityMarkupSerializer.OnBeforeSerialize%2A> grava a extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) à marca de abertura para a atividade, incluindo todos os atributos exigidos.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serializationManager" />, <paramref name="obj" />, or <paramref name="writer" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serializationManager" />, <paramref name="obj" /> ou <paramref name="writer" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="obj" /> is not of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" /> não é do tipo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: The index of the first character in the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: O índice do primeiro caractere na definição da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The index of the first line in the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: O índice da primeira linha na definição da atividade.
